scholars tend to disparage one another (idiom)
physiognomy (judgment of a person's fate, character etc, based on facial features)
when the enemies come face to face, their eyes blaze with hatred (idiom)

definition: Hinayana, the Lesser Vehicle/Buddhism in India before the Mayahana sutras/also pr. [Xiao3 cheng2]
entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to terminate/to cut short/to bring to a stop/to squeeze/to tighten/to damage/variant of 殺|杀[sha1]
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
